PASSWORD_AT_LEAST_8_LENGTH: The password must be at least 8 characters long
PASSWORD_AT_LEAST_1_UPPER_CASE: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
PASSWORD_AT_LEAST_1_NUMBER: The password must contain at least one number
PASSWORD_AT_LEAST_1_SPECIAL_CHAR: The password must contain at least one special character
PASSWORD_MAY_NOT_CONTAIN_SEQUENCES: The password may not contain sequences of three or more repeated characters
LENGTH_AT_LEAST_{{MIN}}: Length of content must be at least {{MIN}} characters
TEAM_NAME_EXISTED: The team name has been existed
